short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click to delete an element from the page
short.ja: 右クリックでページの要素を削除します

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right-click to delete the selected element from the current page.
You can delete elements that are distracting when viewing the page, such as:
* Advertisements
* Intrusive menus
* Unnecessary recommendations
* Anything else

The source code is available at the following URL:
https://github.com/kyo-ago/delete-this-element-extension
